Offshore Wind Turbine Documentation
===================================

This section offers documentation of the offshore wind turbines included in this database. 

The National Renewable Energy Laboratory provides an overview of the offshore wind market in Offshore Wind Technologies Market Reports and Data Updates. 

2019 Data Update: https://www.nrel.gov/docs/fy21osti/77411.pdf

   :maxdepth: 2
   
   2016CACost_NREL_Reference_6MW_155
   2016CACost_NREL_Reference_8MW_180
   2016CACost_NREL_Reference_10MW_205
   2019ORCost_NREL_Reference_12MW_222
   2019ORCost_NREL_Reference_15MW_248
   2020ATB_NREL_Reference_12MW_214
   2020ATB_NREL_Reference_15MW_240
   2020ATB_NREL_Reference_18MW_263
   DTU_10MW_178_RWT_v1
   IEA_10MW_198_RWT
   IEA_15MW_240_RWT
   LEANWIND_8MW_164_RWT
   NREL_5MW_126_RWT
   WTK_Validation_offshore_normalized
